WhatTheWordSaidAsAReference.Word: 7 well favored kine and fatfleshed. 7 ears of corn came up upon one stalk, rank and good.
WhatTheWordSaidAsAReference.ScriptureReference: Genesis 41:2, Genesis 41:5, Genesis 41:18, Genesis 41:22, Genesis 41:26, Genesis 41:29

WhatTheWordSaidAsAReference.Word: 7 ill favored and leanfleshed. 7 thin ears and blasted with the east wind sprung up after them.
WhatTheWordSaidAsAReference.ScriptureReference: Genesis 41:4, Genesis 41:6-7, Genesis 41:19-21, Genesis 41:23-24, Genesis 41:27, Genesis 41:30
